abstract: The forest products company Temple-Inland, which is under pressure from the activist investor Carl C. Icahn, said Monday that it would sell 1.55 million acres of timberland to the Campbell Group for $2.38 billion and then issue a $1.1 billion special dividend.
lead_paragraph: The forest products company Temple-Inland, which is under pressure from the activist investor Carl C. Icahn, said Monday that it would sell 1.55 million acres of timberland to the Campbell Group for $2.38 billion and then issue a $1.1 billion special dividend.

headline.main: Temple-Inland to Sell Land and Pass Proceeds to Investors
